    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Open circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geöffnete Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits ouverts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos abertos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti aperti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοικτά κυκλώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos abiertos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show four examples of open circuits due to a) faulty cell connection, b) disconnected terminal, c) a plastic connector, and d) an open switch</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disconnected terminal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">faulty connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">open switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic connector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen vier Beispiele der 
geöffneten Stromkreise wegen A) des fehlerhaften Zelle Anschlußes, 
B) getrenntes Terminal, c) ein Plastikstecker und d) ein geöffneter 
Schalter</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent quatre exemples des 
circuits ouverts dus a) à la connexion défectueuse de cellules, b) 
terminal débranché, c) un connecteur en plastique, et d) un 
commutateur ouvert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram quatro exemplos dos 
circuitos abertos  devido a) à conexão defeituosa da pilha, b) 
terminal desconectado, c) um conector plástico, e d) um interruptor 
aberto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano quattro esempi dei 
circuiti aperti dovuto a) il collegamento difettoso delle cellule, b) 
terminale staccato, c) un connettore di plastica e d) un interruttore 
aperto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τέσσερα παραδείγματα 
των ανοικτών κυκλωμάτων λόγω α) στην ελαττωματική σύνδεση 
κυττάρων, β) αποσυνδεμένο τερματικό, γ) ένας πλαστικός 
σύνδεσμος, και Δ) ένας ανοικτός διακόπτης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran cuatro ejemplos de los 
circuitos abiertos  debido a) a la conexión defectuosa de la célula,
b) terminal desconectada, c) un conector plástico, y d) un 
interruptor abierto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">getrenntes Terminal</string>
          </keyword>
